amendatorysection.catchline: Sewer or water mains; failure to make connections; order; costs assessed.
amendatorysection.para: If, after ten days' notice by certified mail or publication in a newspaper of general circulation, a property owner fails to make such connections and comply with such regulations as the council may order in accordance with section 16-667.02, the council may order such connection be made, and assess the cost thereof against the property so benefited.
